page.title: 04WELL DRESSINGS (1)
page.content: In Youlgrave every year we have well dressings. We have had well dressings for over 150 years. We dress the wells to say thank you for our lovely spring water. There are five well dressings. {The Reading Room}well usually has children in its picture. The next is at the{Fountain,}built in 1829. It is called the Fountain because originally it was meant to have a spray of water but it didn't work out. The third well is at{Holywell Lane. The fourth well is{Banktop}well and the last well is at{Coldwell End.}Each well has a wooden box with a slot in so they can collect money towards the chosen charities. I helped to do some of the children's well dressing that stands at the church. We make the wells with all different kinds of flower petals, moss and clay. (continued on page 5)
